articles.title: US issues 'Level One' Covid notice for Americans travelling to India - India Today
articles.description: The CDC in its health travel notice 'Level One' said: Your risk of contracting Covid-19 and developing severe symptoms may be lower if you are fully vaccinated with an FDA authorised vaccine.

articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Blood thinners may prevent cognitive decline in older patients with atrial fibrillation - Medical Xpress
articles.description: The anticoagulant medication dabigatran yielded similar results to warfarin for the prevention of cognitive decline in older adults with atrial fibrillation after two years of treatment, according to late-breaking research presented today at the American Hear…
